summary.para: Contains information used to specify each advisory connection. It is used for enumerating current advisory connections. It holds data returned by the enumerator. This enumerator interface is returned by . Each advisory connection is specified by a unique STATDATA structure.
The structure for the data of interest to the advise sink. The advise sink receives notification of changes to the data specified by this FORMATETC structure.
The enumeration value that determines when the advisory sink is notified of changes in the data.
The pointer for the interface that will receive change notifications.
The token that uniquely identifies the advisory connection. This token is returned by the method that sets up the advisory connection.
